subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: After a year of health problems, there were tears of relief for Serena Williams after a 6-3, 3-6, 6-1 victory over Aravane Rezaï in the first round.
snippet: After a year of health problems, there were tears of relief for Serena Williams after a 6-3, 3-6, 6-1 victory over Aravane Rezaï in the first round.
